description: If you've ever wanted to see Marcus Mojo demonstrate his self-defense techniques, THIS is it.  If you've wondered how horny Marcus gets when an ass like Darcy Tyler's brushes against his cock under his shorts, THIS is it.  If you've hoped to witness Marcus turn a training session into a hot, passionate affair, THIS IS IT!Marcus can't keep his boner a secret when it's begging to be unleashed upon Darcy.  She came in for a regular old punching bag lesson, but things are heating up!  Marcus has been salivating as his cock has been swelling, thinking about Darcy's mouth on it.  Watch the Mojo man put that incredible body to work in this outrageously sexy gym romp.Enjoy!
title: Personal Train Her
